    • Field Detail

      • PROPERTY_ALLOWED_RECIPIENT_DOMAINS

        public static final String PROPERTY_ALLOWED_RECIPIENT_DOMAINS
        A system property that, if set, will disallow emails sent to recipients other than specified in a comma separate list. For instance-D"knime.sendmail.allowed_domains"=foo.com,bar.org would allow only emails to be sent to foo.com and bar.org. If other recipients are specified the node will fail during execution. If this property is not specified or empty all domains are allowed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • validateSettings

        void validateSettings()
               throws InvalidSettingsException
        Checks if settings are complete and recipient addresses are OK (according to PROPERTY_ALLOWED_RECIPIENT_DOMAINS.
        Throws:
        InvalidSettingsException - Fails if not OK.

      • send

        void send(FlowVariableProvider flowVarResolver,
          CredentialsProvider credProvider)
   throws javax.mail.MessagingException,
          IOException,
          InvalidSettingsException
        Send the mail.
        Throws:
        javax.mail.MessagingException - ... when sending fails, also authorization exceptions etc.
        IOException - SSL problems or when copying remote URLs to temp local file.
        InvalidSettingsException - on invalid referenced flow vars
